attribute.name.extraspellattributes.conv: Attack Damage gained as Fire Power

Attack Damage gained as Arcane Power
Arcane Power gained as Attack Damage
Attack Damage gained as Frost Power

Attack Damage gained as Healing Power
attribute.name.extraspellattributes.glan: Chance to Receive a Glancing Blow
desc.extraspellattributes.glance: A Glancing Blow deals only 65% damage. You cannot receive Glancing Blows from attacks which don't come from an entity (Such as Fire and Poison).
desc.extraspellattributes.supp: A Suppressed Spell deals only 50% damage.
desc.extraspellattributes.endu: Your % Endurance is how much of your maximum health is deducted from the damage glancing blows would do.
desc.extraspellattributes.acro: Your % Serenity is the chance that a suppressed spell instead deals no damage.
desc.extraspellattributes.determination: Your % Determination is the proportion of health lost that regenerates as health over the next four seconds.
desc.extraspellattributes.reabsorption: You regenerate Absorption (Yellow Hearts) up to your maximum Reabsorption gradually after not being hit for 2 seconds.
